Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The federation has established a bounty on the {@LinkCreature:30#220#arkais} that live in {@Rgn:30001$$Balder's Refuge}.

Kill {@LinkCreature:30#220#teal} and {@LinkCreature:30#210#crimson arkais}.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
